code: @Manual{,   title = {UWBiost561: Partial Clique package},   author = {John Chen},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/JohnChen034/UWBiost561}, }

title: Partial Clique package
text: package called UWBiost561. install, run following code (R): Upon completion, can run following code (R):

what: Compute maximal partial clique function — compute_maximal_partial_clique
title: Compute maximal partial clique function — compute_maximal_partial_clique
text: function identifies subset nodes binary symmetric adjacency matrix form maximal partial clique edge density least alpha. uses greedy expansion algorithm starting top-k highest-degree nodes iteratively adds nodes maintaining required edge density. However, guarantee best solution every task, limited top-k, especially top-k large matrix size large.

title: Compute maximal partial clique function — compute_maximal_partial_clique
Compute maximal partial clique function — compute_maximal_partial_clique
text: adj_mat nxn undirected graph 1 meaning connected 0 meaning unconnected. symmetric generated generate_partial_clique_function. n 5 50 inclusive. alpha threshold minimum edge density potential clique. range 0.5 1 inclusive. top_k_seeds value make algorithm efficient setting starter nodes connections. set sqrt number nodes matrix.

title: Compute maximal partial clique function — compute_maximal_partial_clique
text: list two elements: clique_idx numeric vector node indices partial clique. edge_density edge density among nodes.

what: Generate a Random Partial Clique Adjacency Matrix — generate_partial_clique
title: Generate a Random Partial Clique Adjacency Matrix — generate_partial_clique
text: function creates adjacency matrix representing graph n nodes, subset nodes form partial clique. number nodes clique determined clique_fraction, density edges among clique nodes controlled clique_edge_density.

title: Generate a Random Partial Clique Adjacency Matrix — generate_partial_clique
Generate a Random Partial Clique Adjacency Matrix — generate_partial_clique
text: n positive integer. Total number nodes graph. clique_fraction numeric value 0 1 inclusive. fraction nodes form partial clique. clique_edge_density numeric value 0 1 inclusive. density edges among nodes partial clique. edge_density Single numeric value 0 1, Total edge density use generate whole matrix, default 0.2 .

title: Generate a Random Partial Clique Adjacency Matrix — generate_partial_clique
text: list following elements: adj_mat n x n symmetric adjacency matrix 0s 1s, 1s diagonal, dimnames. clique_nodes integer vector indicating nodes selected part partial clique. instructions message describing partial clique constructed.
